text: mariyu vastavanga, niku purvam cala mandi pravaktalu, asatyavadulani tiraskarincabaddaru. Kani varu a tiraskaranni mariyu tamaku kaligina hinsalanu, variki ma sahayam ande varaku sahanam vahincaru. Mariyu allah matalanu evvaru marcaleru. Mariyu vastavaniki, purvapu pravaktala konni samacaralu idi varake niku andayi
